ignoreCommand: echo skipping linting checks for deployment!

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' blob: data:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.vercel-postgres.com https://*.vercel.app https://vercel.com https://*.anthropic.com https://*.openai.com https://*.pinecone.io
